title: LIFELINE / HEART ATTACK
description: When you lose enough Health (Endurance), you have a heart attack. This is the freebie/tutorial.

dialogueTree.title: Endurance: "You feel something in your chest. A..."
dialogueTree.english: You feel something in your chest. An unnatural pressure. It's spreading to your left arm, your jaw...
dialogueTree.polish: Czujesz coś w klatce piersiowej. Nienaturalny ucisk. Promieniuje ci na lewe ramię, na szczękę...
dialogueTree.belarusian: Вы адчуваеце нешта ў грудной клетцы. Непрыродны ціск. Праменіць у левую руку, у сківіцу...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "We've been here before. You've got..."
links.english: We've been here before. You've got this.
links.polish: Byliśmy tu już kiedyś. Dasz radę.
links.belarusian: Мы ўжо былі тут раней. Ты справішся.

links.title: Endurance: "Nope, sorry, you don't. Not this ti..."
links.english: Nope, sorry, you don't. Not this time.
links.polish: Nie, przykro mi. Nie dasz. Nie tym razem.
links.belarusian: Не, мне шкада. Не дасі. Не гэтым разам.

links.title: Half Light: "Fucking shit, I'm scared. What do I..."
links.english: Fucking shit, I'm scared. What do I do? Who do I call?
links.polish: Ja pierdolę, boję się. Co mam zrobić? Kogo zawołać?
links.belarusian: Я хуяле, баюся. Што мне рабіць? Каго паклікаць?

links.title: Composure: "Don't go grabbing at your chest and..."
links.english: Don't go grabbing at your chest and screaming bloody murder. Keep your cool. Remember -- looking good always makes you feel better.
links.polish: Nie łap się tylko za klatkę piersiową i nie wrzeszcz. Zachowaj spokój. Pamiętaj – każdy czuje się lepiej, kiedy dobrze wygląda.
links.belarusian: Не хапайся толькі за грудную клетку і не крычы. Захоўвай спакой. Памятай – кожны адчувае сябе лепш, калі добра выглядае.

links.title: You: "So I'm guessing this is bad."
links.english: So I'm guessing this is bad.
links.belarusian: Таму я мяркую, што гэта дрэнна.

links.title: Endurance: "Very. *Very* bad. *This is the end*..."
links.english: Very. *Very* bad. *This is the end* bad.
links.polish: Bardzo. *Bardzo* niedobrze. Niedobrze w sensie: *to już koniec*.
links.belarusian: Вельмі. *Вельмі* дрэнна. Дрэнна ў сэнсе: *гэта ўжо канец*.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Get it together, boy. You've gotta..."
links.english: Get it together, boy. You've gotta hold on, no matter how bad...
links.polish: Weź się w garść, chłopie. Musisz się trzymać, jak źle by nie było...
links.belarusian: Сабярыся, хлопча. Ты павінен трымацца, як бы кепска ні было...

links.title: You: "I'm sure it's just heartburn. Oh go..."
links.english: I'm sure it's just heartburn. Oh god...
links.polish: To na pewno tylko zgaga. Boże...

links.title: Endurance: "No. It's many years of combined sel..."
links.english: No. It's many years of combined self-neglect and self-abuse.
links.polish: Nie. To wiele lat samozaniedbania i zachowań autodestrukcyjnych.
links.belarusian: Не. Гэта шмат гадоў саманядбайнасці і аўтадэструктыўных паводзінаў.

links.title: Endurance: "All you feel is pain and weakness...."
links.english: All you feel is pain and weakness. You have to surrender now. We all do, it gets *so* dark. You don't even see her face, like you always thought you would. You only see pain and fear.
links.polish: Czujesz wyłącznie ból i słabość. Musisz się już poddać. Jak my wszyscy – jest już *strasznie* ciemno. Nie widzisz nawet jej twarzy, choć byłeś pewien, że ją zobaczysz – jest tylko ból i strach.
links.belarusian: Ты адчуваеш выключна боль і слабасць. Табе трэба здацца. Як і мы ўсе – тут ужо *страшна* цёмна. Ты нават не бачыш яе твару, хоць быў упэўнены, што яго ўбачыш – ёсць толькі боль і страх.

links.title: Endurance: "There's no shame in surrendering no..."
links.english: There's no shame in surrendering now. We all do, it gets *so* dark. You don't even see her face, like you always thought you would. You only see pain and fear.
links.polish: Poddać się teraz to żaden wstyd. Wszyscy kiedyś to robimy. Jest już *strasznie* ciemno. Nie widzisz nawet jej twarzy, choć byłeś pewien, że ją zobaczysz – jest tylko ból i strach.
links.belarusian: Здацца цяпер – гэта не сорам. Усе калі-небудзь гэта робім. Цяпер *жудасна* цёмна. Ты нават не бачыш яе твар, хоць быў упэўнены, што ўбачыш – ёсць толькі боль і страх.

links.title: Endurance: "Yeah, screaming isn't happening on..."
links.english: Yeah, screaming isn't happening on account of extreme shortness of breath. You're just making it worse. Oh god, it's painful...
links.polish: Tak, o krzyku nie ma mowy, bo kompletnie brakuje ci tchu. Tylko pogarszasz sprawę. Boże, jak boli...
links.belarusian: Так, пра крык і гаворкі няма, бо цалкам не хапае дыху. Толькі пагаршаеш сітуацыю. Божа, як баліць...

links.title: You: "The end of the world is here."
links.english: The end of the world is here.

links.title: Endurance: "Don't think this is a sign of anyth..."
links.english: Don't think this is a sign of anything other than your heart failing.
links.polish: Nie myśl, że oznacza to cokolwiek innego niż to, że twoje serce przestaje pracować.
links.belarusian: Не думай, што гэта азначае нешта іншае, чым тое, што тваё сэрца перастае працаваць.
